snippet: Two college friends of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev pleaded not guilty in federal court Tuesday to charges that they hindered the investigation into the bombings.
abstract: Dias Kadyrbayev and Azamat Tazhayakov, two college friends of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, plead not guilty to charges that they hindered investigation into bombings.
lead_paragraph: Two college friends of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev pleaded not guilty in federal court Tuesday to charges that they hindered the investigation into the bombings.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Two Plead Not Guilty to Aiding Marathon Bomb Defendant
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Two Plead Not Guilty To Aiding Marathon Bomb Defendant
